alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 11:27PM EST until February 19 at 3:30AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of western Pennsylvania, including the following county, Lawrence. * WHEN...Until 115 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1126 PM EST, local law enforcement reported heavy rain in New Castle. Flooding is already occurring. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... New Castle, Ellwood City, Oakwood, New Castle Northwest, New Beaver, Bessemer, Wampum, South New Castle, Harlansburg, S.n.p.j. and Rose Point Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
